name: Keep Running (itch) (Suminsky)
description:
Controls:

W -> Run

A-> Turn Left

D-> Turn Right

LShift-> Turn Faster

The point is last as long as you can, for that, you gonna need to grab the refreshers that popup..But the refresher start to take longer and longer to appear!

Game developed under 72 hours for the Game Dev League Jam, theme: AI.
